EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-11-16
EmailTemplate.subject: 10 Can't Miss Sessions at SpringOne Platform 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 16, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/10-can-t-miss-sessions-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> 10 Can’t Miss Sessions at SpringOne Platform 2017 Jeff Kelly breaks down his 10 must-attend sessions at this year's SpringOne Platform. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/10-can-t-miss-sessions-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/security-the-offensive-line-of-enterprise-aefbdd901fc3?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Security: The Offensive Line of Enterprise Justin Smith explains why it's time to rethink classic approaches to security, and build a playbook that ensures safety and success. Learn More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/security-the-offensive-line-of-enterprise-aefbdd901fc3?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-contributes-steeltoe-to-the-net-foundation?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Contributes Steeltoe to the .NET Foundation We're excited to announce that the Steeltoe open source project is joining the .NET Foundation. Transforming the building of .net apps <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-contributes-steeltoe-to-the-net-foundation?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/navigating-the-apache-geode-sessions-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Navigating the Apache Geode Sessions at SpringOne Platform 2017 Jagdish Mirani does a deep dive into the Apache Geode sessions at SpringOne Platform. Read Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/navigating-the-apache-geode-sessions-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/software-development-and-business-value-connecting-the-dots-ep-50?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Software Development and Business Value: Connecting the Dots (Ep. 50) On this episode of Pivotal Insights, Matt Stine talks about getting back to fundamental software development principles, improving communication within development teams, and delivering business value with software. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/software-development-and-business-value-connecting-the-dots-ep-50?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/how-to-run-a-really-good-retrospective-8982bd839e16?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How to Run a Really Good Retrospective Nichola Rushton explains how to run a great retrospective and why everyone should do them, not just agile teams. Make Great Teams <[[https://builttoadapt.io/how-to-run-a-really-good-retrospective-8982bd839e16?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/learning-cloud-native-architecture-and-coding-with-michael-barinek-ep-84?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Learning cloud native architecture and coding, with Michael Barinek (Ep. 84) In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Coté & Seroter talk with Michael Barinek about the the Platform Acceleration Lab team, how it operates, and the training that they do. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/learning-cloud-native-architecture-and-coding-with-michael-barinek-ep-84?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 11/21 Spring Paris, Paris <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/spring-paris.html?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newslette]]>
11/30 Kubernetes the Simple Way, and Outcome-Based Roadmaps, Dublin <[[https://www.meetup.com/Pivotal-Dublin-Meetup/events/245102200/]]>
12/12 Internal Building Blocks - Aggregates, Entities, Value Objects, ... Part Three, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/dec-12-internal-building-blocks-aggregates-entities-value-objects-part-three-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=ddd-part two-three--plod-q417]]>
12/13 Building a Big Data Fabric with a Next Generation Data Platform, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/dec-13-building-a-big-data-fabric-with-a-next-generation-data-platform-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=big-data-fabric-q417]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
